::Ramulus::

Walking away from the Ark, Ramulus stops as Koj lands near him, asking him 
what's going on.

"We're off to a hostage negotiation," he replies, "Possibly a battle. There 
are cloaking devices and weapons at the Ark. If you wish to accompany us, 
you'll need a cloaking device, a protection chip, and one of the weapons at 
the Ark. They'll protect you from the Trainers' main weapon, a mind controll 
chip."
